Link: https://www.atlassian.com/blog/teamwork/the-importance-of-teamwork

Title: The Importance of Teamwork (as proven by science)

The article explains the importance of distributed work in a workplace setting. Though some used to disagree, teamwork is on the rise, and that is for the better. 

The article then lists 10 benefits of teamwork: 
Enables better problem solving: with more minds come more ideas! 
Potential for innovation: discomfort and being around those not like you pushes you to grow
Happier employees: 80% more likely to express emotional well being in a workplace that encourages teamwork
Enhances personal growth: learn something new about yourself by interacting with others
Lowers risk of burnout: share the load! 
Opportunities for growth: larger groups mean the company can do more complex things
Boosts productivity: getting kudos from a team member is motivating
Smarter risk-taking: take risks and rely on your team
Fewer mistakes: less frazzled means fewer errors
Sparks creativity: great ideas come from communication and teamwork
